title.rendered: INTECH carries out Control Systems Audit for KazGerMunai

content.rendered:
INTECH Process Automation has executed a Control Systems audit project for KazGerMunai. The project encompassed analyzing the outdated control systems at two KazGerMunai fields, Akshabulak, which is one of the 10 largest oil fields in Kazakhstan, and Nuraly, which is a smaller sized oil field. The main objectives of this audit were:

  • To select a direction of the works and aims of automation
  • To create the standard and specific projects of process automations
  • To develop the feasibility study and functional structure of Automated Process Control System
  • To develop and formulate the automation tasks, architecture of hardware and software

The operators at these fields were facing problems with outdated control systems and equipment. They intended to pay special attention to their control systems that would play a critical role in maintaining sustainable plant production and safeguarding plant equipment & field personnel.

INTECH’s consultation services suggested solutions that would overcome these limitations. INTECH also suggested a way forward on how to improve the reliability of the fields’ control systems.

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation Inc. is an international Control Systems engineering and Systems Integration company delivering reliable automation solutions to the Oil & Gas sector since 1991. INTECH has done projects in 31 countries across 6 continents with regional offices in 13 countries, equipping it with 2000+ engineering man-years of experience. INTECH’s vendor-neutral approach and extensive experience help serve both regional and global customers with the highest standards of quality and reliability.

INTECH covers all traditional asset classes (upstream, midstream & downstream) as well as shale and buoy automation. Its wide range of solutions covers traditional control system automation as well as hydraulic (surface and sub-surface) control system automation and advanced software solutions for operations and asset management. Customers benefit from INTECH’s lump-sum turnkey solutions to save costs and increase plant productivity.
